Description.Text:
Position É Hotel is found in the centre of Reggio Calabria and is located directly on the beach with a breathtaking view of the strait. This beautiful location is the ideal place to spend a relaxing summer vacation, to explore the Calabrian coast, or to use as a retreat for those travelling on business.
Restaurant Dishes conceived by our chef are based on the flair of a typical Mediterranean cuisine revisited with genious and inventiveness. Coeliac menu is possible. èhotel Restaurant is open every day for lunch & dinner.
